---
title: "Difference-in-Differences"
---


# Assignment 10

## Load Data


::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_a90de17df4b0ad01c72119a7ae1405c3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
#> ✔ dplyr     1.1.3     ✔ readr     2.1.4
#> ✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
#> ✔ ggplot2   3.4.4     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
#> ✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
#> ✔ purrr     1.0.2     
#> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
#> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
#> ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hospitals <- readRDS("~/Documents/TUHH/Casual Data Science for Business Analytics/Causal_Data_Science_Data/hospdd.rds")
```
:::


## Manual Computing


::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_7b143b2816c3d11d352ee4c36c62a0d6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Step 1: Difference between treatment and control group BEFORE treatment
before_control <- hospitals %>%
  filter(hospital >= 19 & hospital<= 46, procedure == 0) %>% 
  pull(satis)
before_treatment <- hospitals %>%
  filter(hospital >= 1 & hospital<=18, procedure == 0) %>% 
  pull(satis)

diff_before <- before_treatment - before_control
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Warning in before_treatment - before_control: longer object length is not a
#> multiple of shorter object length
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Step 2: Difference between treatment and control group AFTER treatment
after_control <- rep(0, dim(hospitals)[1])
after_treatment <- hospitals %>%
  filter(hospital >= 1 & hospital<=18, procedure == 1) %>% 
  pull(satis)

diff_after <- after_treatment - after_control
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Warning in after_treatment - after_control: longer object length is not a
#> multiple of shorter object length
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
diff_diff <- diff_after - diff_before
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Warning in diff_after - diff_before: longer object length is not a multiple of
#> shorter object length
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# sprintf("Estimate: %.2f", diff_diff)
# didn't print it cause its very wrong
```
:::


## Linear Regrression

### month + hospital


::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_07df24c16441c5388941c6c66ac80d7f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_1 <- lm(satis ~ month + hospital, data = hospitals)
summary(lm_1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = satis ~ month + hospital, data = hospitals)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -3.3831 -0.6724 -0.0838  0.5778  5.7881 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>               Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)  3.7597212  0.0308145  122.01   <2e-16 ***
#> month        0.0720728  0.0055957   12.88   <2e-16 ***
#> hospital    -0.0175982  0.0008732  -20.16   <2e-16 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 1.017 on 7365 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.07208,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.07183 
#> F-statistic: 286.1 on 2 and 7365 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::


### as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital)


::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_855bbfbc545b911d8e0ca56bf1749274'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_2 <- lm(satis ~ as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital), data = hospitals)
summary(lm_2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::
:::


### Explanation

I believe I will use the second one with as.factor as it provides estimates for each hospital and also each month rather than all hospitals in all months in the first one.
